Text: Buy One Get One Half OffIMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Dear Footlocker Enthusiast You have a list and weve got gifts So why not take advantage of Foot Lockers BUY ONE GET ONE HALF OFF SALE Beginning November buy anything you want even if its on sale and get HALF OFF a second item Thats any item Buy a pair of shoes and get a second item for half price buy a gift and get something for yourself for half price you choose Head on over to any Foot Locker Lady Foot Locker or Kids Foot Locker and score with these great savings This offer is only valid until November so dont wait To take advantage of this offer online enter promotional code INFLBOGO during the checkout process For a store location near you either click here or call IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Click here to email this page to a friend This message was sent by footlockercom Click here if you prefer not to receive future email from footlockercom Click here to view our permission marketing policy IMAGE
